area.name: Hell
area.path: 6e 4s 2e s 2e d 3n e 4s 4w s w 2s d 2s d e 2s d e 2s w s w s w d 2e d s e 3s

mobiles.name: oldstyle Guardian guard
mobiles.long_description: A Guardian of Hell stands here, keeping you the Hell out.
mobiles.description:
The guardian is a stone devil, a hideous creation from the dark laboratories
of Hell.  Its black eyes stare into your soul with a hunger that makes you
shiver.  The guardian stands motionless before you.  Its rough grey skin
looks impervious to normal weapons.

mobiles.name: oldstyle pile coins
mobiles.long_description: A pile of gold coins lies on the ground.
mobiles.description: A large sparkly pile of gold coins.

mobiles.name: oldstyle male dee demon
mobiles.long_description: The male demon Dee lies on the bed, waiting to please you.
mobiles.description:
This is the most handsome male you have ever seen.  The well-defined
muscles on his naked body make your mouth water.

mobiles.name: oldstyle female dee demon
mobiles.long_description: The female demon Dee lies on the bed, waiting to please you.
mobiles.description:
This is the most beautiful female you have ever seen. The curves of her
naked body make you sweat and babble uncontrollably.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bar gold
mobiles.long_description: A shiny gold bar lies on the ground.
mobiles.description: This gold bar must be worth bucks!

mobiles.name: oldstyle chicken pot pie
mobiles.long_description: A yummy looking chicken pot pie is here.
mobiles.description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with chicken and vegetables.

mobiles.name: oldstyle beef pot pie
mobiles.long_description: A yummy looking beef pot pie is here.
mobiles.description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with beef and vegetables.

mobiles.name: oldstyle vegetable pot pie
mobiles.long_description: A yummy looking vegetable pot pie is here.
mobiles.description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with vegetables.

mobiles.name: oldstyle damned soul
mobiles.long_description: A damned soul wanders aimlessly here.
mobiles.description:
You see the faint silhouette of a person. Looking closely at it, you can barely 
make out features that would identify it as the person it was in life.

mobiles.name: oldstyle tortured soul
mobiles.long_description: A tortured soul screams out in pain.
mobiles.description:
You see a unrecognizable person going through unheard-of and
indescribable torture. It screams out at you in pain and terror.

mobiles.name: oldstyle half-eaten person
mobiles.long_description: A half-eaten person lies here, writhing in agony.
mobiles.description:
This poor soul looks as if he has been chewed on and spit out.  He writhes
He is in agony and terror as he gasps frantically for Death to answer his
desperate plea...

mobiles.name: oldstyle living wall
mobiles.long_description: A wall stands here. Its surface seems to move and come to life...
mobiles.description:
The wall consists of greying and sinewy flesh - faces, hands,
broken bones, feet, and toes jutting from the surface. You hear low moans
of horror, pain, and sorrow issuing from within.

mobiles.name: oldstyle skeletal warrior
mobiles.long_description: A skeletal warrior wanders the planes of Hell.
mobiles.description:
Rotting flesh and gore drop from the bones of this creature.
Its decaying eyes stare at you intently as it sees only your
delicious and juicy brain.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bloody severed arm
mobiles.long_description: A bloody severed arm lies here.
mobiles.description:
The bloody arm of some poor, luckless individual.  The stench of the
gore-covered limb makes you want to retch.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bloody severed foot
mobiles.long_description: A bloody severed foot lies here.
mobiles.description: This bloody foot definitely wasn't a lucky one.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bloody severed nose
mobiles.long_description: A bloody severed nose lies here.
mobiles.description:
I wonder how the person that lost this smells...Hopefully not as bad as
this nose does...

mobiles.name: oldstyle blood
mobiles.long_description: The blood in the fountain gurgles merrily.
mobiles.description: You see gallons and gallons of thick red blood gurgling in the fountain.

mobiles.name: oldstyle Lost soul
mobiles.long_description: A lost soul stands here looking lost.
mobiles.description:
This soul is definitely clueless to as where he is. He holds a ticket
that reads #14349023402342039840293481234900049.

mobiles.name: oldstyle crispy critter
mobiles.long_description: A crispy critter is here, being burned to death.
mobiles.description:
This was once a person.  Now it is only a charred and smoking hulk that
is being burned for eternity.  It screams out as the flames lick at its
body and devour its flesh...

mobiles.name: oldstyle pile bones skeleton
mobiles.long_description: A decaying pile of bones lies on the ground.
mobiles.description:
Stringy bits of flesh blow gently in the breeze. The bones rattle as you walk
by them.

mobiles.name: oldstyle manes sub-demon
mobiles.long_description: A manes wanders the planes of Hell, looking for something to kill.
mobiles.description:
A gruesome sub-demon who used to be mortal, this is a semi-intelligent
creature who attacks, with nails and teeth, anyone it encounters.  It is
often fed upon by demon lords and princes.  Its green-and-red blotched
skin gives it a diseased and decaying look.  It somewhat resembles a
shadow or a ghost.

mobiles.name: oldstyle prisoner raiden
mobiles.long_description: The prisoner of Hell, Raiden sits here for eternity.
mobiles.description:
This is a sad individual. He smells strongly of the rotten food that has been
thrown at him. He sits here chained to the wall, banished to Hell forever by
the gods.

mobiles.name: oldstyle prisoner hell
mobiles.long_description: A sad looking individual sits here, awaiting torture.
mobiles.description:
She is sad-looking, indeed:  cuts and scrapes all over her.  Many scars
and burns cover her face and arms.  The appalling condition of her once-lovely
breasts makes you avert your eyes.

mobiles.name: oldstyle prisoner hell
mobiles.long_description: A sad looking individual sits here ,awaiting torture.
mobiles.description:
He is sad-looking, indeed:  cuts and scrapes all over him.  Many scars
and burns cover his face and arms.  One of his arms is broken at the
elbow and hangs limply by his side.

mobiles.name: oldstyle demonguard demon guard
mobiles.long_description: A demonguard patrols the planes of Hell.
mobiles.description:
This very large demon stands before you, licking his daggerlike teeth.
Yellow spittle runs down the scales of his blackened skin.

mobiles.name: oldstyle burning fool
mobiles.long_description: A burning fool is here, crisping away.
mobiles.description:
You can barely make out anything on it. All you can make out are the flames 
of Hell consuming it, and the smell of burning flesh.

mobiles.name: oldstyle construction worker male
mobiles.long_description: A construction worker is here, welding pipework.
mobiles.description:
He is the typical construction worker:  T-shirt, jeans, yellow hard hat.
As you look closer at the hard hat, you notice that it says:
             '4th DEMONsion Construction Co.'

mobiles.name: oldstyle construction worker female
mobiles.long_description: A construction worker, is here working riviting framework.
mobiles.description:
She is the typical construction worker:  T-shirt, jeans, yellow hard hat.
As you look closer at the hard hat, you notice that it says:
             '4th DEMONsion Construction Co.'

mobiles.name: oldstyle fire devil
mobiles.long_description: A fire devil stands here with a box of matches, lighting up poor souls.
mobiles.description:
It is an indescribably grotesque creature.  Its pale, green-yellow skin
erupts with blisters and puss.  As you look at it, it smiles at you with
sharp, blood-covered teeth.  This is definitely a face only a mother could
love.

mobiles.name: oldstyle wall fire
mobiles.long_description: A wall of fire is here, creeping slowly across the room.
mobiles.description:
It is simply a large, door-sized wall of fire.  It slowly inches across the
room, burning everything in its path, including the poor souls that are chained
to the various posts around the room.

mobiles.name: oldstyle hell hound
mobiles.long_description: A hell hound runs freely through the halls of hell.
mobiles.description:
This freak of a canine is rusty red to red-brown in color. Its eyes glow a
ghastly red. Its sooty black teeth and tongue are covered with green spittle
that runs down its dung covered coat.

mobiles.name: oldstyle frozen body
mobiles.long_description: A frozen body lies on the ground.
mobiles.description:
As you look at the corpse, you recoil when you see that its eyes still
move.  They stare intently from its bluish face, as if pleading for your
help.

mobiles.name: oldstyle ice devil
mobiles.long_description: A Greater Ice Devil stands here, cheerfully freezing souls.
mobiles.description:
This devil is a mix of bug, bird, humanoid, and who knows what else.
Its multi-faceted eyes stare everywhere. It goes about its business of 
slowly and painfully freezing the damned souls, quickly thawing them
and then starting over. Every couple of minutes, it takes time out to 
break an appendage off a nearby soul and beat the soul with it.

mobiles.name: oldstyle trapped soul ice
mobiles.long_description: A soul trapped under the ice gasps desperately for air.
mobiles.description:
This poor soul has been incased in ice, almost as though it were caught
under an iceflow.  It will desperately gasp for air for a few minutes,
then will seem to die briefly.  Always, it is restored and begins thrashing
about again.

mobiles.name: oldstyle half frozen body
mobiles.long_description: A half frozen body hangs on a meat hook.
mobiles.description:
A large meat hook is imbedded deep within the back of the corpse. You
see small white maggots eating away at the body. The flesh seems to
move and wriggle with a life of its own...

mobiles.name: oldstyle killer penguin
mobiles.long_description: A small penguin waddles around on the ice.
mobiles.description:
What a cute little penguin! Wait, why is it looking at you that way?
HEY! Penguins don't have teeth!

mobiles.name: oldstyle I-scream worker
mobiles.long_description: An I-scream worker runs from machine to machine.
mobiles.description:
It moves about so frantically that you can't really get a chance to look at it.
It runs about screaming, 'I SCREAM, YOU SCREAM!

WE ALL SCREAM FOR I SCREAM!!!'

mobiles.name: oldstyle Ice Screamer
mobiles.long_description: An Ice Screamer is yelling into empty cartons.
mobiles.description:
He is dressed in a white jumpsuit with the words,

'Eye Spleen I Screamery'

written on it in large, yellow letters.

mobiles.name: oldstyle Construction Foreman Demonic
mobiles.long_description: A Demonic Foreman sits here, looking at blueprints.
mobiles.description:
This huge demon has somehow managed to fit himself into
a oversized, orange jumpsuit. The words,

'4th DEMONsion Construction Co.' are written on the 
back in large, black letters.
He seems none too happy to see you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle Secretary of Hell
mobiles.long_description: The Secretary of Hell sits here, watching the phones ring.
mobiles.description:
This very sexy secretary seems to be just sitting here amusing herself
by watching the little lights on the telephone blink. She is oblivious
to your presence and seems fascinated by the phones.

mobiles.name: oldstyle office worker hell
mobiles.long_description: An office worker from Hell is looking for a boss to piss off.
mobiles.description:
Just looking at him makes your blood boil. 
AAAAAAAAAAaaaaaaaaaaaarrrrrrrrgggggghhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!

mobiles.name: oldstyle records worker
mobiles.long_description: A records worker is here, filing bad reports.
mobiles.description:
You see a rather plain-looking office personel here, filing paperwork on
someone.

mobiles.name: oldstyle santa claus
mobiles.long_description: Santa Claus is here, checking on who has been naughty...
mobiles.description:
It's a jolly old man, with red cheeks and a roly-poly belly and a laugh
as jolly as you can get. Must be Santa Claus!

mobiles.name: oldstyle high priest ell
mobiles.long_description: The High Priest of Hell is here, eating 'I Scream'.
mobiles.description:
The dark, black robes hide most of his features, but you can nearly make
out his emaciated face beneath the hood.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bowl blood
mobiles.long_description: A bowl of blood sits on the altar.
mobiles.description: It is a wooden bowl filled with blood and bits of flesh.

mobiles.name: oldstyle jury member
mobiles.long_description: A jury member sits here with a "Guilty" sign, waiting for the trial to begin.
mobiles.description: It seems to be a lesser demon disguised as mortal. Fair trial?  Not likely.

mobiles.name: oldstyle Judge Whopper
mobiles.long_description: Judge Whopper sits here, trying to think of a painful sentence.
mobiles.description:
This is the High Judge of Hell. He has never found anyone innocent
and is notorious for his painful and harsh punishments.

mobiles.name: oldstyle lawyer hell
mobiles.long_description: The Lawyer from Hell sits here, playing games on his laptop computer.
mobiles.description: Slimy, sleezy, and with very sharp teeth... A lawyer all right...

mobiles.name: oldstyle complaints officer
mobiles.long_description: The Complaints Officer is here, watching her favorite soap opera.
mobiles.description:
She seems not to notice you, but is absorbed in her favorite soap,
'As The Hell Burns'

mobiles.name: oldstyle bastard hiramoto
mobiles.long_description: The Bastard Hiramoto stands here, trying to learn Kung Fu from a book.
mobiles.description:
He looks at you and says, 'I think my Kung Fu is no good'
and then goes back to practicing.

He is known to buy anything, and to sell anything sold to him.

mobiles.name: oldstyle maintenance worker
mobiles.long_description: A maintenance worker is here, fixing stuff.
mobiles.description: He is in a yellow jumpsuit with a large nuclear-warning symbol on the back.

mobiles.name: oldstyle weeds
mobiles.long_description: A weed is growing out of the cement.
mobiles.description: You see a nasty yellow-and-purple weed.

mobiles.name: oldstyle stanley
mobiles.long_description: Stanley stands here, waiting to sell you one of his wonderful figurines.
mobiles.description:
He is a crafty old fart who looks about 1000 years old, but his figurines
are pretty well-known.  He was rumored to have disappeared around Solace 100
years ago.

mobiles.name: oldstyle half eaten horse carcass
mobiles.long_description: A half-eaten horse carcass is here being digested.
mobiles.description:
This is what used to be a horse.  Hmm, maybe - it's hard to tell.  Half
of it has been digested already.

mobiles.name: oldstyle stomach dragon
mobiles.long_description: A stomach dragon is here, digesting Big Mouth's food.
mobiles.description:
A large, brown-and-green, slime-covered reptile, its function seems to be
to move to each food item and barf acid all over it.

mobiles.name: oldstyle rancid turkey leg
mobiles.long_description: A rancid turkey leg sits in a pool of slime.
mobiles.description:
It's one of those really nasty pieces of food in the refrigerator that
disappears, and you wonder if it just walked away....

mobiles.name: oldstyle reactor specialist
mobiles.long_description: A reactor specialist sits here, checking on the reactor core.
mobiles.description:
He is dressed in a black jumpsuit with a large nuclear-warning symbol on
the back.

mobiles.name: oldstyle reactor worker
mobiles.long_description: A reactor worker sits here, monitoring various screens.
mobiles.description:
He is dressed in a black jumpsuit with a large lighting bolt symbol on
the back.

mobiles.name: oldstyle homer simpson
mobiles.long_description: Homer Simpson sits here, eating donuts.
mobiles.description:
A balding fat man with jelly stains on his uniform.

He suddenly spills his coffee and shouts out, 'DOH!'
Warning lights blink rapidly as the coffee shorts out the control panel.
Homer calmly stands up, unplugs the control panel, and sits down
for a nap.

mobiles.name: oldstyle devil's food cake
mobiles.long_description: A nice slice of devil's food cake is here, waiting to be eaten.
mobiles.description: Mmmmmm...Don't you just want to take a bite?

mobiles.name: oldstyle mad cook
mobiles.long_description: A mad cook is here, cooking up a storm.
mobiles.description: He spots you and screams, 'Git awa froom mi food!  I'll kill you!'

mobiles.name: oldstyle frantic lady
mobiles.long_description: A frantic lady is here, looking in vain for a sale and tearing her hair out.

mobiles.name: oldstyle nuclear technician
mobiles.long_description: A nuclear technician is here, fiddling with his rad suit.

mobiles.name: oldstyle stray proton
mobiles.long_description: A stray proton is here, whizzing about.

mobiles.name: oldstyle radiation
mobiles.long_description: The radiation in the room does unknown things to you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle chief engineer hell
mobiles.long_description: The Chief Engineer of Hell is here, playing with the panic button.
mobiles.description:
He kinda reminds you of an old Bart Simpson.  He seems to be enjoying
the panic button at the moment, chuckling happily as workers on the
reactor floor below frantically check dials and gauges, while lights
are flashing and sirens are screaming in the background.

mobiles.name: oldstyle Greater Fire Demon
mobiles.long_description: A Greater Fire Demon stands here, laughing at each scream he hears..
mobiles.description:
This large, black-scaled demon laughs merrily as he watches poor souls
scream out in pain. He pokes and picks at the flesh of the damned who
were unlucky enough to be tortured close to him.  His black-taloned
nails rip slowly through their flesh as he cackles with glee at the
sounds of their unending pain...

mobiles.name: oldstyle frozen side beef
mobiles.long_description: A frozen side of beef hangs on a hook.
mobiles.description:
This enormous carcass looks as if it came from a small dragon or a very
large cow.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard dog
mobiles.long_description: A guard dog sits here, guarding the break room.
mobiles.description: A vicious-looking pit bull / demon-dog mix is here, slobbering on the donuts.

mobiles.name: oldstyle juicy steak
mobiles.long_description: A mouth-watering, juicy steak is here, steaming.
mobiles.description: Mmmmmmm.....Steak....Mmmmmm...You feel your mouth start to water.

objects.name: wicked trident two-handed
objects.description: A wicked-looking trident is stuck into the ground.

objects.name: black leather whip
objects.description: A black leather whip lies on the ground.

objects.name: hickey maker
objects.description: A hickey maker lies on the ground, making a soft sucking sound.

objects.name: sword farslayer two-handed
objects.description: A black-hilted sword with engravings on the blade lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The blade of the sword is a full meter long and straight as an arrow, with
lightly-fluted sides.  Both edges are keened down to perfect lines, invisibly
sharp.  Perfection like this could have only been forged by a god.  The black
hilt is contrasted only by the faint symbol of a white arrow.
Upon the blade is engraved a poem:

                      Farslayer howls across the world
                      For thy heart, for thy heart, who hast wronged me!
                      Vengeance is his who casts the blade
                      Yet he will in the end no triumph see.

objects.name: angel's skull
objects.description: An angel's skull lies here on the ground.

objects.name: rotting flesh
objects.description: Some rotting flesh lies here in a pile.

objects.name: sword vorpal blade two-handed
objects.description: A magnificently crafted blade lies here, humming softly.

objects.name: flaming claw
objects.description: A flaming claw lies here, burning brightly.

objects.name: demonskin
objects.description: A black, scaley pile of demonskin lies here.

objects.name: demon teeth
objects.description: A bunch of very sharp, slimey teeth lie here.

objects.name: burning flesh
objects.description: A pile of burning flesh lies here.

objects.name: rivet gun
objects.description: A rivet gun loaded with hot rivets lies here.

objects.name: circular saw
objects.description: A circular saw lies here.

objects.name: box matches
objects.description: A box of matches lies here, ready to light something.

objects.name: bloody black talon
objects.description: A severed bloody, black talon lies here.

objects.name: jar of blood
objects.description: A dark jar of blood lies here.

objects.name: hell hound teeth
objects.description: The bloody teeth of a hell hound sit here.

objects.name: icy bottle
objects.description: An icy bottle sits on the floor.

objects.name: ice spear two-handed
objects.description: A spear made out of ice lies here.

objects.name: large meat hook two-handed
objects.description: A large meat hook is stuck into the ground.

objects.name: meat
objects.description: A chunk of meat lies here.

objects.name: blueprint
objects.description: A construction blueprint lies on the ground.

objects.name: electric eraser
objects.description: A electric eraser lies on the ground, waiting for an erasermate.

objects.name: spectacles
objects.description: A set of spectacles lies here on the ground. Don't step on them.

objects.name: unholy symbol
objects.description: A sinister-looking symbol of evil lies here smoldering.

objects.name: unholy robes pile cloth
objects.description: A stinking pile of cloth lies here.

objects.name: sharp teeth lawyer
objects.short_description: the sharp teeth of a lawyer
objects.description: A set of sharp, evil-looking teeth lie here. Probably a lawyer's.

objects.name: golden ring
objects.description: A golden ring lies on the ground.

objects.name: engagement ring
objects.description: An engagement ring lies here.

objects.name: prenuptual agreement
objects.description: A prenuptual agreement lies here.

objects.name: ionic torque wrench
objects.description: You see an ionic torque wrench on the ground.

objects.name: figurine horse
objects.description: You see a small figurine of a horse on the ground.

objects.name: figurine winged horse pegasus
objects.short_description: a figurine of a winged horse
objects.description: You see a small figurine of a winged horse on the ground.

objects.name: figurine dark horse nightmare
objects.description: You see a small figurine of a dark horse on the ground.

objects.name: figurine black dragon
objects.short_description: a figurine of a black dragon
objects.description: You see a small figurine of a black dragon on the ground.

objects.name: figurine red dragon
objects.short_description: a figurine of a red dragon
objects.description: You see a small figurine of a red dragon on the ground.

objects.name: figurine white dragon
objects.short_description: a figurine of a white dragon
objects.description: You see a small figurine of a white dragon on the ground.

objects.name: figurine green dragon
objects.short_description: a figurine of a green dragon
objects.description: You see a small figurine of a green dragon on the ground.

objects.name: figurine blue dragon
objects.short_description: a figurine of a blue dragon
objects.description: You see a small figurine of a blue dragon on the ground.

objects.name: geiger counter
objects.description: You see a Geiger counter here.

objects.name: photon displacement matrix
objects.description: You see a photon-displacement matrix on the ground.

objects.name: black jumpsuit
objects.description: You see a black jumpsuit on the ground.

objects.name: antacid pill
objects.description: You see an antacid pill here.

objects.name: manes claws
objects.description: The severed claws of a sub-demon lie here, twitching.

objects.name: welding torch
objects.description: A welding torch sits on the ground.

objects.name: blond wig
objects.description: A blond wig lies on the ground.

objects.name: yellow jumpsuit nuclear symbol
objects.description: You see a yellow jumpsuit with a nuclear-warning symbol.

objects.name: cleaver
objects.description: You see a nasty-looking cleaver stuck in the ground.

objects.name: fire opal gem
objects.description: A flaming red gem lies on the ground.

extra_descriptions.description:
The fire opal is a nicely-polished round gem, with orange, gold, and red
mixed together like the heart of flame.  You can almost feel the hellfire
from whence it came.

objects.name: hellstone hell stone
objects.description: An evil black gem rests here, hoping to seduce you with its evil.

extra_descriptions.description:
The hellstones are mined from the deepest pits of Hell at the cost of the
blood, sweat, and pain of hundreds of damned souls.  You feel vaguely ill
as you gaze into its lustrous black heart.

rooms.name: Stone Archway
rooms.description:
This is a ancient stone archway. Various faces of demons and other grim
pictures are painted onto it. Stone gargoyles and demons glare down at
you from atop the arch.
There is a bronze plaque above the archway.

exits.exit_description: The air seems cleaner to the south.
It's too dark to see.

extra_descriptions.description:
***************
Descent to Hell
***************

You just GO TO HELL!!!!
*chuckle*

Made for levels 30-50

Brought to you by Strahd

rooms.name: Ancient Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in a large stone room - feels like a crypt.  Ancient murals
of Hell and punishment cover the walls.  In the middle of the room are stairs
that lead down into the darkness.  From the stairway you can smell brimstone
and sulfur.
To the west, there appears to be a shrine.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
You see an ancient shrine.
You see a dark stairway.

rooms.name: Dark Stairway
rooms.description:
You are standing at the bottom of long dark stairway.  The smells of brimstone
and sulfur choke you.  Screams of pain and terror fill the air.
Stone faces carved into the walls seem to laugh at you.
Maybe this is not such a good idea after all....

exits.exit_description: It's too dark to see.
You see a dark stairway.

rooms.name: Landing
rooms.description:
This landing has been scorched as if a large brushfire had swept through it.
Bits of ash and burnt vegetation cover everything.  The walls and floor are
flawlessly smooth, and the ceiling is covered with carved faces and ancient
symbols and runes.
Large, black iron gates tower over you to the west.
You see a large gateway to the west.

exits.exit_description: It's too dark to see.
You see the Gates of Hell

extra_descriptions.description:
These black iron gates are covered with grotesque faces and other
creatures in various poses and acts of violence and lust. The gates
make your blood run cold...

rooms.name: Gateway to Hell
rooms.description:
You stand next to the very gateway of Hell. You are surrounded by 
the sounds of torture and pain. Screams pierce the air and rattle your
nerves. Displays of the treats of Hell are in all directions.
A large black iron gates tower over you to the east.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
The Gates of Hell
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

extra_descriptions.description:
These black iron gates are covered with grotesque faces and other
creatures in various poses and acts of violence and lust. The gates
seem to make your blood run cold...

rooms.name: Hall of the Damned
rooms.description:
This hallway is a monument to the millions of damned souls in Hell.
The walls are made up of various body parts and other, unidentifiable
things. Many of the faces that make up the wall scream out to you for
help. Their arms desperately grasp at your clothing as you pass.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Hall of the Damned
rooms.description:
This hallway is a monument to the millions of damned souls in Hell.
The walls are made up of various body parts and other, unidentifiable
things. Many of the faces that make up the wall scream out to you for
help. Their arms desperately grasp at your clothing as you pass.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Hall of the Damned
rooms.description:
This hallway is a monument to the millions of damned souls in Hell.
The walls are made up of various body parts and other, unidentifiable
things. Many of the faces that make up the wall scream out to you for
help. Their arms desperately grasp at your clothing as you pass.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Hall of the Damned
rooms.description:
This hallway is a monument to the millions of damned souls in Hell.
The walls are made up of various body parts and other, unidentifiable
things. Many of the faces that make up the wall scream out to you for
help. Their arms desperately grasp at your clothing as you pass.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
You see a dark stairway leading down.

rooms.name: Hall of the Damned
rooms.description:
This hallway is a monument to the millions of damned souls in Hell.
The walls are made up of various body parts and other, unidentifiable
things. Many of the faces that make up the wall scream out to you for
help. Their arms desperately grasp at your clothing as you pass.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Mural of the Dead
rooms.description:
You stand before a large mural. The mural depicts mountains of dead
bodies piled up to the sky. The mural covers the whole north wall from
floor to ceiling. You can smell the stench of decaying flesh.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Living Walls
rooms.description:
The walls here actually consist of greying and sinewy flesh - faces, hands,
broken bones, feet, and toes jutting from the surface. You hear low moans
of horror, pain, and sorrow issuing from within.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Trapped souls
rooms.description:
There are many souls trapped behind the walls of this room, almost as though 
they were trapped beneath the surface of a frozen lake. Even the floor and 
ceiling show the screaming faces behind them.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Tortured Beings
rooms.description:
This room is filled with instruments of torture. Beings of all shapes and
sizes are being brought to the thresholds of pain and beyond. Some are
being sliced into thousands of pieces.  Others are being stretched as though
they were made of rubber.  All are caught in an unending play of agony.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Gluttony
rooms.description:
Before you is a room filled with all sorts of food. The smells of pastries and
hamburger assault your senses. All sorts of food lay everywhere you look.
Cookies, twinkies, steak, prime rib, almost anything you can think of, call
out to you. You suddenly feel VERY hungry.

exits.exit_description: It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Greed
rooms.description:
What luck! A room full of treasure. Gold, diamonds, riches beyond
imagination! Wait! You suddenly feel as if it were all slowly disappearing.
Someone is taking your treasure. They have no right! It is yours! You
found it first. Let them go get their own treasures!
You see a door to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see a bedroom door.
It's too smoky to see.
It's too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Bedroom.
rooms.description:
This is a small bedroom. It is well furnished and is a drastic change from
the room you just stepped out of. A bed stands against the far wall.
Upon the headboard of the bed are carved two cherub-like figures, with the
the words 'DEE & DEE' written below them.
The door to the bedroom is to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see a bedroom door.

rooms.name: Ancient Shrine
rooms.description:
This is an ancient, abandoned shrine of some unknown god. It has been
vandalized and torn apart. What used to be the shrine has been reduced to
a large pile of stone and other debris. Various runes and demonic faces
have been spray-painted on the walls and floor.  Nailed to the ceiling are
an assortment of skeletons.  All seem to have been dead for a very long
time. All surfaces of the room are covered with dried blood and dust.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Room full of Body Parts.
rooms.description:
The room is filled with piles of arms, legs, heads, and other, unidentifiable
parts of many different creatures. The stench is overwhelming. The body
parts seem to wiggle and scream as you get closer. They are still alive!!

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Fountain of Blood.
rooms.description:
This room is made of a rough black stone. The walls seem to ooze black
sludge. In the middle of the room stands a stone fountain of a demon spitting
blood.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Bloody Stairway.
rooms.description:
You are standing on a very slippy stairway. The walls and stairs are
covered with blood and gore. Pieces of goo and ooze drip from the
ceiling overhead. You almost slip a couple times on the stairway.
The stench here is overwhelming.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Ancient Room
rooms.description:
This is a very old and dusty room. It looks empty except for a few shards
or bone and flesh.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Room of Lost Souls
rooms.description:
This looks like a waiting room or sorts. Dust and cobwebs are everywhere.
Wooden benches line the walls. A digital number sign is posted on the wall.
It currently reads, 'Now Serving Number 1'.
A ticket dispenser is bolted to the wall.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

extra_descriptions.description: This is one of those red ticket dispensers that never seem to work right.

rooms.name: Pit of Fire
rooms.description:
You enter a plain stone room with a large fire pit in the center of it.
As you look closer at the pit you realize that hundreds of people are being
burned inside it. They Scream out to you. The noise is deafening. Several
minor imps and workers push more people into the pit, whistling while

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Blackened Hallway
rooms.description:
This dark hallway looks as if it was made by a lavaworm...All the surfaces
in it are melted and burnt. The smell of brimstone and sulfur fill the air.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Blood Room
rooms.description:
You enter the room and are immediately assaulted by the smell of rotting
flesh and blood. The walls are covered with the crimson fluid as it runs
down from the ceiling.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Skeleton Factory
rooms.description:
This is probably where they make all the skeletons for nightmares and
graveyards. The room is simply littered with bones. A poster on the
wall reads, "Remember ....the head bone is connected to the neck bone.."
The poster continues on...but it seems to get very technical and boring..

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Bottom of Stairway
rooms.description:
You are standing at the bottom of a bloody stairway. Or at least you
thought it was a stairway. It seems to be just a painting the the wall.
This roughly carved room with evil runes carved  in to the stone floor.
There is a hallway to the east.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Stone Hall
rooms.description:
This is a roughly carved hallway. The air here is damp and musty. You 
hear the sound of something dripping in the distance. Your footsteps
echo down the hall as you walk. There is a strange and deathly silence
that fills these halls...
The hall continues to the south and the west.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Cell
rooms.description:
The cell is very damp and very musty. The walls are covered with moisture
and dirt. The smell of urine is very potent here.
The steel bars to the cell are to the south.

exits.exit_description: You see bars

rooms.description:
This is a long forgotten room. Ancient torture equipment stands around
collecting dust. Most of this stuff was probably replace with modern
hi tech torture devices and for sentimental reasons wasn't thrown away.

rooms.name: Hot Stairs
rooms.description:
You are standing on a long stairway. The air around you is heavy and hot.
The stone walls are hot to the touch and your sweat sizzles as it hits the
ground. Cool air flows out from a crack in the wall to the east.
The smell of brimstone and smoke is all around you.
The stairs continue down.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Crack in Wall
rooms.description:
This is a rather large crack in the wall. On closer inspection it appears to be
a passageway that was closed off long ago. It was probably reopened by
an earthquake or something.
An ancient passageway continues to the north.
Hot gusts of air come from the west.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Stone Arch
rooms.description:
Before you stands the a large stone arch decorated with many runes you
cannot decifer. It looks as though it has been closed up for a long time.
To the east is a hallway of fire.
To the south you see a large metal door with the words, 'FOREMAN'
written on the door.
There is a dark stairway down in the corner of the room.

exits.exit_description: You see a hall of fire.
You see the Foreman's office.
You see a dark stairway down.

rooms.name: Hall of Fire
rooms.description:
You are standing in a hallway made of fire. The walls are ablaze with
yellow and blue flames. The smell of the hot air and sulfur burn your
lungs as you inhale, and dry your mouth as you exhale. The stone floor
burns at your feet and hungrily drinks up every drop of sweat as they
fall from your body.
The hall of fire continues to the east.
You see a stone archway to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see a hall of fire.
You see a stone archway.

yellow and blue flames. The smell of the hot air and sulfur burn your
lungs as you inhale, and dry your mouth as you exhale. The stone floor

fall from your body.
The hall of fire continues to the south and west.

exits.exit_description: You see a hall of fire.
You see a stone archway.

rooms.name: Construction Area
rooms.description:
This part of Hell seems to be under repair. Workers are fixing and replacing
what look like various gas mains and other pipework. You can see many
gas lines and electrical conduits within the dismantled walls. Partially
hidden fire sprinklers are being installed in the ceilings.
You see more contruction to the east and south.

exits.exit_description: You see a construction area.

rooms.name: Fire Pits of Hades
rooms.description:
This room is filled with many small fire pits. Countless damned souls are
being burnt and roasted within the the white flames that erupt from the
many pits. Wailing and screams of pain chill your bones in this hot room.
To the south you see a lake of fire.
A fire hall lies to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see a lake of fire.
You see a hall of fire.

rooms.name: Fire Mural
rooms.description:
Apon all the walls of this room is an enormous mural. Pictures of burning
bodies and tortured souls seem to be the main theme of the art. Bright reds
and hot blues are enphasized throughout the mural. As you stare at it the
characters within it seem to move and struggle in pain. The hot air around
you smells of sulfur and methane. To the south you see a stone hallway.
Hot air blows in at you from the doorway. The air stirs up the methane and
steals your breath. You choke and gag...

exits.exit_description: You see a stone hallway.

rooms.name: Foreman's Office
rooms.description:
You stand in a crudly constructed office. Blueprints and change orders are
scattered everywhere. A metal filing cabinet stands in the corner. Before
you stands a stone table covered with blueprints. On the wall is a 
construction plaque that reads, "4th DEMONsion Contruction"

exits.exit_description: You see the door to the office.

rooms.name: Cold Stairway
rooms.description:
You stand apon a cold stone stairway. Hot air blows down on you from
higher up the stairwell. From below you a freezing gusts bite at your skin
and make you shiver. Icicles drip slowly from the ceiling onto the frosted
stone floor.

exits.exit_description: It is too dark to see.
It is too dark to see.

rooms.name: Wall of Fire
rooms.description:
This large room is cut in into sections by small walls of fire. The walls
to move slowly changing the layout of the room. As you examine the room
further you notice various posts around the room to which people are
chained. The firewalls seem to move in patterns that leave the poor
people directly in the path of the oncoming fire. The walls seem to creep
ever so slowly towards them. The people blister and scream as the fire gets
closer. Their deaths seem like minutes of agony and pain, and even as they
burst into flames they seem incapable of grasping the merciful attention of
death...
To the north you see a hall of fire.
To the east you see a lake of fire.

exits.exit_description: You see a hall of fire.
You see a Lake of fire.

rooms.name: Lake of Fire
rooms.description:
You stand one the shore of a large lake of fire. The smoke and heat fill this
enormous room. You can barely make out shapes of something moving
withing the dancing flames of blue and gold..

exits.exit_description: It is too smoky to see.
It is too smoky to see.
It is too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Hot Hall
rooms.description:
The stone floor below you heats your feet uncomfortably. The ceiling and
walls glow a dull red and you sweat uncomfortably under the heat.

exits.exit_description: You see a Mural Room.
It is too smoky to see.

rooms.name: Icy Landing
rooms.description:
This landing is made entirely of ice. Its walls bear carvings of battle and
hunting scenes in bas-relief. These carved scenes show ice devils slaying
angels, hunting mortals and other gruesome pictures.
To the east you see a room of ice.

exits.exit_description: You see a room of ice.

rooms.name: Ice Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in a room of ice. Icicles of every size hang from the
ceiling. Some shake with every sound. Your reflection off the ice walls
seems to dance and wiggle as you move about.
To the south you see more of the frozen room.
To the west you see an Icy landing.

exits.exit_description: You see a room of ice.
You see a room of ice.

rooms.name: Meat Locker
rooms.description:
You are standing in what looks like a meat locker. Rows of beef and other
meats hang from large steel hooks. You also notice that many of the
things hanging from the hooks are corpses of people. They reach out to
you as you pass them as if to plead for help from their frozen mouths. 
The meat locker continues to the east and south.

exits.exit_description: You see more of the Meat locker
You see more of the Meat locker

rooms.name: Meat Locker
rooms.description:
Rows of beef and other meats hang from large steel hooks. You notice that 
many of the things hanging from the hooks are corpses of people. They 
reach out to you as you pass them as if to plead for help from their frozen 
mouths. 
The meat locker continues to the south and west.
There is a freezer door to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see a freezer door.
You see more of the Meat locker

rooms.name: Penguin Room
rooms.description:
This is what appears to be a replica of an iceberg. Penguins waddle about
the room pecking at many poor souls half trapped in the icy floor. You
seem to be outside, as the walls are painted to seem as if you are standing
on a vast icy slab with nothing but ocean around you. 
The iceberg continues to the south and east.
There is a freezer door to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see lots and lots of ice.
You see lots and lots of ice.
You see a freezer door.

rooms.name: Ice Creamery
rooms.description:
You appear to be standing in a ice-creamery. Many ice-cream workers run
frantically around tending to the various machines.
The factory continues to the east and south.

exits.exit_description: You see lots of ice-cream machines.
You see lots of ice-cream machines.

rooms.name: Ice Creamery
rooms.description:
You appear to be standing in a ice-creamery. There seems to be a
group of people here shouting into containers and then quickly covering 
them. How odd...
The factory continues to the south and west.
There is a steel door to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see a steel door.
You see lots of ice-cream machines.
You see lots of ice-cream machines.

rooms.name: White Marble Hall
rooms.description:
You are standing in a white marble hallway. It is dry and clean. Many
portraits of demons and devils in business suits adorn the walls on either
side of you.
The hall continues to the south.
To the west is a steel door.

exits.exit_description: You see a marble hallway.
You see a steel door.

rooms.name: Refrigerator Room
rooms.description:
This room is filled with giant refrigerators. All of them have no doors and
their contents have spilled onto the floor.
The only exit is east.

rooms.name: Ice Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in a room of ice. Icicles of every size hang from the
ceiling. Some shake with every sound. Your reflection off the ice walls
seems to dance and wiggle as you move about.
To the north and east you see more of the frozen room.
To the west you see a room full of refrigerators.

exits.exit_description: You see a room of ice.
You see a room of ice.

rooms.name: Meat Locker
rooms.description:
You stand in a large meat locker. Chunks of meat hang on the wall and 
larger corpses hang from steel hooks. Frozen blood and other 
unrecognizable pieces are littered on the floor.
The meat locker continues to the north and east.
There is a freezer door to the west.

You see more of the Meat locker

rooms.name: Penguin Room
rooms.description:
This is what appears to be a replica of an iceberg. Penguins waddle about
the room pecking at many poor souls half trapped in the icy floor. You
seem to be outside, as the walls are painted to seem as if you are standing
on a vast icy slab with nothing but ocean around you. 
The iceberg continues to the north and east.

exits.exit_description: You see lots and lots of ice.
You see lots and lots of ice.

rooms.name: Ice-Creamery
rooms.description:
You walk into part of an ice-cream factory. Many different types of
ice-cream and other deserts are made by these machines. Above one
of the machines a sign reads, 'Eye Spleen I Screamery'.
The factory continues to the north and east.
You can hear sounds of penguins to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see lots of ice-cream machines.
You see lots of ice-cream machines.
You see a dark passageway.

rooms.name: Ice-Creamery
rooms.description:
You stand amidst dozens of ice-cream machines. Workers rush about
for machine to machine, adjusting dials and checking gauges.
The factory continues to the north and west.

exits.exit_description: You see lots of ice-cream machines.
You see lots of ice-cream machines.

rooms.name: Marble Hall
rooms.description:
You are walking down a white marble hallway. Large portraits of demons
and devils adorn the walls on either side of you. As you look again you
realize that they aren't demons and devils after all, but lawyers....well ok...
depends on your point of view...
The hallway continues to the north.
There is an office to the south.

exits.exit_description: You see a white marble hallway.
You see an office.

rooms.name: Records Hall
rooms.description:
This Hallway is actually an enourmous records library. Millions of records
are kept here detailing the status of peoples lives. These are confidential
files and only authorized personnel are allowed to view them.
The records room continues to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see rows and rows of records.

rooms.name: Small Altar
rooms.description:
This is the private prayer room of the high priest. a small altar stands
against the west wall. Evil symbols and pictures are plastered everywhere.
The new propaganda posters for Hell are posted behind the altar.
You see a blackened hall to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see a blackened hallway.

extra_descriptions.description:
Don't go to heaven....They're boring....

***GO TO HELL!!!****

You'll be damned if you don't  ;)

rooms.name: Blackened Hall
rooms.description:
This hall looks as if it was burned out recently. The walls are charred and
smoking. Ashes and bits of burnt timber crunch under your feet as you 
walk down the hall. A sign on the wall reads, 'No Non-smoking Please'. 
The hall continues to the south.
There is a stone door to the east and a prayer room to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see a stone door.
You see a blackened hall.
You see a prayer room.

rooms.name: Office of the High Priest
rooms.description:
This is the office of the High Priest of Hell. A black stone desk stands
before you. The office is lavishly furnished with gold, gems and many
antiques. A large portrait of a demons face is on the wall behind his desk.
You see a stone door to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see a stone door.

rooms.name: Administration of Hell
rooms.description:
This is the entrance to the Administration offices of Hell. The secretaries
desk sits quietly in the middle of the room. To the south is a metal door
labeled, 'Authorized Personnel Only'
To the west is a large glass door.
There is a stairway down on the opposite side of the room.
There is a sign posted next to the stairs.

exits.exit_description: You see a marble hall.
You see a metal door.
You see a glass door.
You see a stairway down.

extra_descriptions.description:
****ATTENTION***
The Abyss is CLOSED for construction.

We will open for your painful pleasures

soon....

-Strahd-

rooms.name: Halls of Judgement
rooms.description:
You are standing in the Halls of Judgement. There are many alcoves 
which contain different methods of torture. Each more grotesque than
the one before it. On the wall a plaque reads, 'If you are here...You are
Guilty...You have been judged...sound fair? Too bad..'
The hall continues to the east.
The Courtroom is to the south.

exits.exit_description: You see the Halls of Judgement.
You see the Court of Hell.

rooms.name: Stairs to the Abyss
rooms.description:
These dark stairs are made out of the bones of the damned. They rattle
softly as you tread apon them as if to cry out in protest. The air is filled
with the wailing of lost souls and the blood curdling screams of the
punished.

exits.exit_description: You see the eternal darkness of the Abyss.

rooms.name: Maintenance Walkway
rooms.description:
This is a maintence accessway. You walk on a metal catwalk hundreds of 
feet above the floor. The catwalk sways unsteadily as you walk on it.
The catwalk continues to the south.
To the north is a steel door.

exits.exit_description: You see a steel door.
You see a maintenance walkway.

rooms.name: Court Room
rooms.description:
This is the Courts of Hell. Here you are convicted, sentenced and punished.
And no...you don't get a trial. You don't deserve one. The courtroom is
filled with spectators and jury members. They seem to have no real reason
to be here since there isn't going to be a trial. They jeer and boo you as you
stand in the middle of the courtroom.
To the north is the Halls of Judgement.
Behind the judges bench is a wooden door.

exits.exit_description: You see the Halls of Judgement.
You see a large wooden door.

rooms.name: Lawyers Office
rooms.description:
As you look around you, you realize you've entered a lawyers office. Now
you know you are in Hell....Everything in this office seems to be made of
snakeskin. This is the only lawyers office in Hell, so if you don't  like them
you're out of luck. But then again...if you are in Hell...you must've run
out of luck a while ago.
To the east is the Office of Complaints.
To the south you see a courtyard.

exits.exit_description: You see the Office of Complaints.
You see a courtyard.

rooms.name: Office of Complaints
rooms.description:
This is a relatively small office. There is a large hole in the wall where a 
clerk usually sits and takes complaints about Hell. As you peek behind
the counter you see a large paper shredder and alot of shredded complaints.
a sign over the clerks desk reads, 'Hours: 12:00am - 12:01am'
To the west is a lawyers office.
To the north you see the Halls of Judgement.

exits.exit_description: You see the Halls of Judgement.
You see a lawyers office

rooms.name: Pawn Shop
rooms.description:
You are standing in Hiramoto's Buy & Sell. This poor bastard has
been damned to Hell to serve the public for eternity. He will buy most
anything you have, since business is slow. Not many people visit
Hell. The store is filled with worthless junk. Piles of aluminum balls,
and bottle cap collections fill the corners of the room. Junk of
all kinds is scattered about the store.
To the east you see the Mall from Hell.

exits.exit_description: You see the Mall from Hell.

rooms.name: Hallway of The Mall from Hell
rooms.description:
This is definitely the Mall from Hell...there are no stores!
Only in Hell would they have a mall with no stores.
To the east you see the Mall from Hell.
To the west you see Hiramoto's Buy & Sell.
The hall continues to the east and south.

exits.exit_description: You see the Mall from Hell.
You see the Mall from Hell.
You see Hiramoto's Buy & Sell.

To the east you see the office of Big Mouth.

rooms.name: The Office of Big Mouth
rooms.description:
This is the office of Big Mouth, head demon of Hell's Administration.
The room is decorated posters of naked women and autographed pictures
of famous tortured souls. Behind a large oaken desk sleeps Big Mouth.
This mouth looks large enough to step into if it were open. You wonder
what this guy eats...

exits.exit_description: You see the hallways of the Mall from Hell.
You see Big Mouth's mouth.

rooms.name: Judge's Chambers
rooms.description:
This is the private chambers of the High Judge of Hell. He has a cushy job
and his office reflects that. Golden torches light the walls with dancing
blue and yellow flames. The judge's black crystal desk sparkles in the 
torchlight.

exits.exit_description: You see the Courtroom of Hell.

rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description:
This courtyard is barren and neglected. Small weeds grow up in between
the concrete slabs. An old defunct fountain sputters with a grey-brown
ooze.
A lawyers office is to the north.
The courtyard continues to the east and south.

exits.exit_description: You see a lawyers office.
You see a more of the courtyard.
You see a more of the courtyard.

rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description:
This courtyard is barren and neglected. Small weeds grow up in between
the concrete slabs. An old defunct fountain sputters with a grey-brown
ooze.
The courtyard continues to the west and south.
Stanley's Magical Steeds is to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see Stanley's Magical Steeds store.
You see a more of the courtyard.
You see a more of the courtyard.

rooms.name: Stanley's Magical Steeds
rooms.description:
This is the shop of Stanly. He used to be an old mage selling cursed
trinkets at the town of Solace. He has recently set up shop in Hell selling
magical figurines. Each figurine is in the shape of some sort of steed.
Some are recognizable and some are not. Rumor has it that Stanley made
a deal with a devil....so I guess his lease is up in seven years.....
A courtyard is to the west.
To the south you see the Mall from Hell.

exits.exit_description: You see a hallway of the Mall from Hell.
You see an abandon courtyard.

The hallway continues to the north and south.

rooms.name: Inside Big Mouth's Stomach
rooms.description:
You are standing inside Big Mouth's stomach. It is roomy in here. Small
animals and other odds and ends lie about the stomach. Is that a dragon  
you see? Nah...couldn't be...

exits.exit_description: You see Big Mouth's throat.

rooms.description:

exits.exit_description: You see the eternal darkness of the Abyss.

rooms.name: Reactor Control Room
rooms.description:
This is the reactor control room of Hell. From here the workers control
the main reactor and power supply for all of Hell and the abyss. Workers
stroll back and forth, from station to station monitoring the reactor core.
A large glass window looks out onto the reactor floor below.
There are some stairs down to the reactor floor to the south.
There is a maintenance room to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see a maintenance room.
You see stairs down to the reactor floor.

rooms.name: Maintenance Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the primary maintenance room of Hell. Tools of all
shapes and sizes are neatly hung on the walls, each with its own painted-on
silhouette behind it.
To the west is the reactor control room.
To the east is the break room.
To the north is a maintenance walkway.
To the south is the secondary control room.

exits.exit_description: You see a maintenance walkway.
You see a break room.
You see the secondary control room.
You see the reactor control room.

rooms.name: Break Room
rooms.description:
This is the break room for the maintenance workers. tables are filled with
donuts and coffee. As a cruel joke, the cheif engineer has posted his guard
dogs to guard the room so that no one can take a break.
To the west is the primary maintenance room.
To the south is the chief engineers office.

exits.exit_description: You see the chief engineers office.
You see the primary maintenance room.

rooms.name: Hell's Kitchen
rooms.description:
Welcome to Hell's kitchen, where everything is delicious....you just can't
have any....This is where the many foods of the world of Farside are made.
The chefs are usually very busy, but they always have extra time to torture
a guest....
To the east is a courtyard.

exits.exit_description: You see an abandon courtyard.

rooms.name: Stairs to the Abyss
rooms.description:
These dark stairs are made out of the bones of the damned. They rattle
softly as you tread apon them as if to cry out in protest. The air is filled
with the wailing of lost souls and the blood curdling screams of the
punished. You can't seem to find the Abyss...you seem to recall a seeing a
sign....now what did it say again?......

rooms.name: Inside the Reactor Core
rooms.description:
You are standing on the inside of the reactor core. Actually you seem to
be floating in the plasma energy of the reactor. You can see the core
chamber fall off into the distance as it seems to be bottomless. Nuclear
particles and other strange things whiz by you at blinding speeds.
You see a maintenance hatch to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see a maintenance hatch.

rooms.name: Reactor Room Floor
rooms.description:
The room is taken up almost entirely by the enormous reactor core. The
core pulses rhythmically as it generates the heat and power for the entire
region of Hell. Many workers in orange jumpsuits run frantically around
with geiger counters and plasma torches fixing breaches in the core.
You see a reactor core maintenance hatch to the west.
A stairway to the control room is to the north.

exits.exit_description: You see the stairs to the control room.
You see a reactor core maintence hatch.

rooms.name: Secondary Control Room
rooms.description:
This is the secondary control room for the reactor core. It is usually used in
emergencies when the primary control room is contaminated or damaged.
It isn't used very often since the primary control room is in perfect 
working order.

exits.exit_description: You see the primary maintenance room.

rooms.name: Office of the Chief Engineer
rooms.description:
This office belongs to the chief engineer of Hell. Blueprints and pencils 
are scattered about the room. The air is heavy with the smell of ammonia
and sweat. A display of the reactor core is mounted into the wall.
One wall is completely filled with monitors, each showing various
status reports for the reactor core.

exits.exit_description: You see the break room.

rooms.name: Ice Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in a room of ice. Icicles of every size hang from the
ceiling. Some shake with every sound. Your reflection off the ice walls
seems to dance and wiggle as you move about.
